content: Replace server.js with minimal entry point
Update header documentation for modular architecture
Add minimal imports and server startup
Preserve essential documentation and client routing info
Verify under 30 lines and clean startup logging
Fix missing dotenv configuration in server.js

Remove GET / route from assets.routes.js
Remove mainApp function from assets.controller.js
Add root route directly in app.js after static middleware
Remove wildcard /:coach/:page route from assets.routes.js
Remove dynamicPages function from assets.controller.js
Add wildcard route directly in app.js after all other routes
Fix incorrect path resolution in static middleware
Fix incorrect path resolution in root route
Fix incorrect path resolution in wildcard route
Add debug logging to app.js for Express version and middleware chain
Add test route to verify app functionality
Fix Express v5 compatibility or downgrade to v4
Remove debug logging from app.js
Remove debug test route from app.js
Clean up server startup message
